|cpu1chip1 = Cortina Systems;ELCS3516C;Storlink SL3516; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM9 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 300 <!-- 300MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL256P11TFI01; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU121622DTP-D43; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366SR; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:26:5A |oui = 00:26:5A

|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA, |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel (EIAJ-02) |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (19200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J3

|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink |defaultssid_regex = ^dlink$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-NS01 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/23/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069321900 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B002COJEOU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMP-N08 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2880F; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820L; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WRGNS01.4A1G" and "1012" is silkscreened on the [https://dflund.se/~triad/krad/dlink-dir-685/dir-685-pcb-back-large.jpg board]. :OEM: [[Alpha Networks]] (WRG-NS01)
This device has a fan. The RT2880 module is soldered in. :The CPU used is the [[Storlink]] SL3516 / [[Cortina]] CS3516.
The default SSID is presumed to be '''dlink'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA7009|02/20/2009}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cortina]]'' ELCS3516C ARM9 (@300MHz) *Memory: 128 (SDRAM) DDR *Storage: 32MB Flash, 1x SATA Port *WiFi: [[Ralink]] RT2880F (802.11bgn) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/30864-smashed-mash-up-d-link-dir-685-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.ohgizmo.com/2009/06/30/ohgizmo-review-d-link-dir-685-xtreme-n-storage-router/ Reviewed on '''OhGizmo''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=634986 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (links to pictures) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r22607966-DLinks-new-DIR685-is-speed-daemon Post on '''DSLReports''' with specs] :(once housed some assumedly useful pictures now gone) *[https://dflund.se/~triad/krad/dlink-dir-685/ Booting mainline Linux on this router]
